segments.text: Do I have to deposit my handbag at the checkroom ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , you do not have to . The handbag can be taken with you . There is the cart at the entrance .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I'd tike to buy some milk powder for my baby . Is there anything that you can recommend for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , how old is your baby ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The milk powder on the second level of the shelf is for the kids from 2 ages to 4 ages . I advice that you should buy the Wyeth brand , the source of milk is imported from New Zealand .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can be assured of it . There are various nutritions which are beneficial for the growth of babies ' bone and cerebrum .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is feeding-bottle as the free gift .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is thoughtful . I will take it .
segments.speaker: S1
